https://tmrev.io/movie/319411-Artists of the 20th Century: Man Ray 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6E4G6vbllueH14p7ltE3J9zaUME.jpg An indefatigable experimenter who participated in the Cubist, Dadaist and Surrealist art movements, Man Ray (1890-1976) created a new photographic art that emphasized chance effects and juxtapositions. Ray used solarization, grain enlargement and cameraless prints (called "Rayographs") -- made by placing objects directly on photographic paper and exposing them to light. Artists of the 20th Century: Man Ray
